title: Caroline Flack is make-up free as she goes for hike in Los Angeles
text:
She’s poised for a busy new year with the welcome return of Love Island in January.

But Caroline Flack was enjoying some rest and relaxation on Thursday afternoon during her current stay in Los Angeles.

The presenter, 39, went make-up free as joined a female friend for a hike across one of the Californian city’s many winding, uphill trails.

The good life: Caroline Flack was enjoying some rest and relaxation on Thursday afternoon during her current stay in Los Angeles

Sporting a grey T-shirt and matching shorts, Caroline caught the eye as the two friends paused for refreshments before setting off.

The presenter added to her look with a pair of yellow running shoes, while a black rucksack was slung across her back.

Securing her long brunette locks with a large hairband, Caroline revealed a fresh, make-up free complexion during her latest public appearance.

Upbeat: The presenter was in high spirits as she prepared for a hike across one of the Californian city’s many winding, uphill trails

In good company: Caroline was joined by a female friend during her latest outing in Los Angeles

Appropriate attire: Sporting a grey T-shirt and matching shorts, Caroline caught the eye as she paused for refreshments before setting off

Caroline's outing comes as Love Island, the show she has presented since 2015, prepares to return with the first winter series in its history.

Insiders have confirmed to MailOnline that staff working on the show are jetting off to Cape Town, South Africa, on New Year's Day (January 1) and have a week to prepare before the official anticipated launch on January 8.

The new cast will fly out just days before the series begins, but bosses will recruit 'test Islanders' in the lead up to ensure they know the best places to create maximum drama.

Banter: Caroline shared a joke with her female compaction as they relaxed on the sidewalk

Laughs all round: Caroline checked her phone as the pair had a giggle before setting off on their hike

Vivid: The presenter added to her look with a pair of yellow running shoes

A TV source told MailOnline: 'The new Winter Love Island will launch the second week of January.

'Bosses are still deciding on the final date but it is thought to be January 8 – a week after staff arrive in South Africa.

'It has been decided that the show will run for six weeks instead of the usual eight.

'The new cast of singletons fly out just days before the launch but bosses work with test Islanders to uncover the best spots in the villa to create drama.'

Islanders will meet in a brand new villa that has been built especially for the show, with Caroline returning as host and Iain Stirling, 31, as narrator.
